name: License not required to act as cemetery or pre-need funeral salesperson
text: §441-25  License not required to act as cemetery or pre-need funeral salesperson.  Chapter 467, relating to real estate brokers and salespersons, shall not be applicable to cemetery salespersons. [L 1967, c 199, pt of §1; HRS §441-25; am L 1969, c 242, §8; am L 1970, c 62, §1; am L 1975, c 21, §10; am L 1976, c 200, pt of §1; am L 1981, c 221, §11; gen ch 1993]
